document.heading: District of Columbia Official Code Title 29 (Business Organizations) Enactment Act of 2009

history.narrative: Law 18-378, the “District of Columbia Official Code Title 29 (Business Organizations) Enactment Act of 2009”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-500, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 7, 2010, and December 21, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 27, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 18-724 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-378 became effective on July 2, 2011.
